original_text: And they had breastplates, as it were breastplates of iron; and the sound of their wings was as the sound of chariots of many horses running to battle.
korean_text: 또 철 호심경 같은 호심경이 있고 그 날개들의 소리는 병거와 많은 말들이 전쟁터로 달려 들어가는 소리 같으며

sentences.original_text: as it were breastplates of iron
and the sound of their wings
was as the sound of chariots
of many horses running to battle
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 말들이 전투로 달려가는 것 같았다
